definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: squeezing, pressing, wringing (3 t.) [[־אַף יוֹחִיא דָָם]]´[[מִיץ חָלָב יוֹחִיא חֶמְאָה וּמ]] :[[אַפַּיִם יוֹחִיא רִיב]] ´[[וּמ]] Pr 30:33 the squeezing of milk produceth curd (v. Thomson:Land and Book, Centr. Pal. 456 Rob:BR i. 485; ii. 418), and the squeezing of the nose produceth blood, and (so) the squeezing of anger (i.e. pressure, insistence) produceth strife.
